verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I sought the Lord
And He answered me
And delivered me
From every fear

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Those who look on Him
Are radiant
They'll never be ashamed
They'll never be ashamed

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This poor man cried
And the Lord heard me
And saved me from
My enemies

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Son of God
Surrounds His saints
He will deliver them
He will deliver them

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Magnify the Lord with me
Come exalt His name together
Glorify the Lord with me
Come exalt His name forever

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Taste and see
That the Lord is good
Oh blessed is he
Who hides in Him

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh fear the Lord
Oh all you saints
He'll give you everything
He'll give you everything

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
(Bridge)
Let us bless the Lord
Every day and night
Never ending praise
May our incense rise
[x3]
